/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active transportation system. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of traffic and providing information to pedestrians and drivers alike. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
